articles.title: China Announces New Economic Stimulus Package
articles.summary: The Chinese government unveils a $500 billion stimulus plan targeting infrastructure and tech innovation.

articles.title: Japan's Central Bank Holds Rates Amid Economic Uncertainty
articles.summary: The Bank of Japan maintains interest rates at historic lows to support post-pandemic recovery.

articles.title: South Korea's Tech Sector Sees Record Growth in Q2
articles.summary: Korean tech giants report surge in semiconductor exports driven by global AI demand.
